You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesK K] > &kcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Kcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/041a/index.htm U+0041A].
  * `&kcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/043a/index.htm U+0043A].
